mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq ,a.memberID ,a.memberName ,a.memberMobile ,a.memberMailName ,a.memberPlace ,a.memberSignDatetime ,a.memberModDatetime ,a.memberDelNY FROM member a WHERE 1=1
AND a.memberName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
AND a.memberDelNY = 0
AND a.memberDelNY = 1
AND a.memberSignDatetime BETWEEN date(#{shStartDate}) AND date(#{shEndDate})
AND a.memberModDatetime BETWEEN date(#{shStartDate}) AND date(#{shEndDate})
ORDER BY a.seq ASC
ORDER BY a.memberSignDatetime ASC
ORDER BY a.memberModDatetime ASC
LIMIT 20
LIMIT 30
LIMIT 10
